about.title: About CoC Masters PL
about.subtitle: A family of Clash of Clans clans united by passion and excellence
about.mission_body_1: The CoC Masters PL family represents a coalition of three Clash of Clans clans, each dedicated to excellence in Clan War League competition. From coc masters PL through Akademia CoC PL to Psychole! - we foster a culture of strategic gameplay, mutual support, and continuous improvement.
about.mission_body_2: This platform showcases our collective CWL performance, celebrating individual player achievements while tracking family-wide progress. Every star earned, every attack executed, and every percentage point of destruction contributes to our shared legacy.
about.statistics_intro: Our CWL statistics are compiled from season results and updated regularly. The platform tracks:
about.footer_note: Data sourced from official CWL results â€¢ Platform built for the CoC Masters PL family

guide.welcome: ğŸº Welcome to the Roster Builder. Player scoring uses: Performance (avg stars + 3â˜…), Attendance (presence), and League Difficulty (Champion I > lower). Auto-distribute assigns top players to clans automatically. Choose wisely â€” Metro and Frytkownica are watching.
guide.welcomeShort: Build your dream team or your opponent's nightmare ğŸº
guide.lockRosterTip: Locked roster = commitment. No mid-season panic changes. Andrzej and Thorek will still meme about it.
guide.lockRosterShort: Lock to prevent auto-distribute from touching your roster
guide.seasonsTip: Choose how many seasons to analyze. 0 = everything (may include ghosts and old Metro memes), 2 = safe default.
guide.seasonsGhostWarning: âš ï¸ Watch out for ghosts! More seasons = more players who haven't played in ages. Check the 'Seasons' column.
guide.avgStarsExplain: Avg Stars = sum of all stars earned Ã· number of attacks made. Simple as Brutox's plan for the fryer.
guide.avgStarsColors: Colors: ğŸŸ¢ â‰¥2.5 (king), ğŸŸ¡ 2.0-2.49 (solid), ğŸ”´ <2.0 (needs practice with Riqirez).
guide.reliabilityTip: Reliability is a weighted score: Performance (45%) + Attendance (35%) + League Difficulty (20%). It considers not just presence, but attack quality and the league tier where stars were earned.
guide.reliabilityFormula: Formula: (Performance Ã— 0.45) + (Attendance Ã— 0.35) + (League Ã— 0.20). Performance = avg stars + 3â˜… rate. Attendance = attacks/wars. League = Champion I=100, II=90, III=80, Master I=70, etc.
guide.reliabilityColors: Colors: ğŸŸ¢ â‰¥85% (elite), ğŸŸ¡ 70-84% (solid), ğŸ”´ <70% (needs improvement).
guide.formTip: Form combines avg stars, 3â˜… rate, and reliability. Below 7 wars, data is less reliable â€” like promises after a few beers.
guide.threeStarTip: What % of attacks end in three stars. 50%+ = elite; <20% = practice on friendlies.
guide.outColumnTip: Mark players on vacation, banned, or temporarily excluded. Excluded players are ignored by auto-distribute.
guide.autoDistributeTip: Magic button that distributes players by Reliability (Performance + Attendance + League). Starts from the strongest clan, assigns players with highest scores. Skips locked rosters and excluded players.
guide.autoDistributeWarning: Pro tip: lock the clans you manage first, then auto for the rest. Algorithm favors Champion I/II players.
guide.projectedStarsTip: Estimate of how many stars the roster will earn over 7 wars. Formula: sum of (player avg Ã— 7). It's math, not prophecy â€” Metro may disagree.
guide.subsTip: Players 16-17 are substitutes. Use them when the main roster falls apart. Better to have than not.
guide.guestClansTip: Add clans outside the CoC Masters PL family for inter-clan CWL or collabs. Purple = guest.
guide.minWarsTip: Filter players with minimum war count. Recommended: 5+ for reliable data.
guide.seasonColumnWarning: Check the 'Seasons' column â€” lots of wars from ages ago might mean inactive players.
guide.proTip1: Reliability combines: Performance (45%), Attendance (35%), and League Difficulty (20%) â€” Champion I players rank higher.
guide.proTip2: Auto-distribute uses Reliability as the main criterion â€” best players go to strongest clans.
guide.proTip3: Keep 2 subs in case of rage-quits. Lock clans before auto.
guide.proTip4: Export the image and post to Discord â€” let Andrzej and the crew evaluate the rosters.

annotations.lockIcon: Click to freeze the roster. No takebacks for 8 days â€” Metro can't mess with it.
annotations.autoButton: Click if you want the algorithm to sort players for you (Brutox not guaranteed).
annotations.ghostWarningShort: Heads up: more seasons = more inactive players.

aboutRoster.title: CWL Roster Builder
aboutRoster.subtitle: Comprehensive guide to building optimal Clan War League teams for CoC Masters PL

intro.title: What is the Roster Builder?
intro.description: The CWL Roster Builder is an advanced tool for building optimal 15-player teams for Clan War League (CWL) tournaments. The tool automatically evaluates players based on their historical performance and distributes them across clans, ensuring balanced and competitive rosters.
intro.analysisDesc: Player evaluation based on historical performance

reliability.title: Reliability System
reliability.description: Reliability is a comprehensive metric measuring a player's consistency and quality in CWL. It combines three important aspects:
reliability.performanceDesc: How many stars a player earns per attack
reliability.attendanceDesc: What percentage of possible attacks the player completed
reliability.leagueDesc: Which leagues the player has played in (higher = better)

weights.title: Weights & Scoring
weights.description: When automatically distributing players between clans, we use 3 metrics:

form.title: Form & Rankings
form.description: Form is a dynamic metric showing a player's current effectiveness. It's used for quick player comparison and highlighting those with the best recent performance.
form.avgStarsDesc: Primary signal of attack quality - higher is better
form.warsFactorDesc: Players with few wars receive a penalty as their data is less reliable. Minimum 7 wars (1 full CWL season) for full weight.

league.title: League Projection
league.description: League projection adjusts a player's predicted stars based on the difference between their historical league and the target clan's league. Harder leagues mean stronger opponents.
league.harderLeagueDesc: Penalty for playing against stronger opponents
league.easierLeagueDesc: Bonus for playing against weaker opponents
league.highDesc: Player plays in the same league - no adjustment
league.mediumDesc: 1 tier change or moving to easier league
league.lowDesc: 2+ tier change or no historical data

autodistribute.title: Auto-Distribute
autodistribute.description: Auto-distribute is an algorithm that automatically assigns players to clans in an optimal way.
autodistribute.step1Desc: Take Reliability, Average Stars and 3-Star Rate. Convert to 0-1 scale and apply weights.
autodistribute.step2Desc: Players are ranked from best to worst.
autodistribute.step3Desc: For each clan: take the 15 best available players meeting TH requirements.
autodistribute.step4Desc: Each clan has 15+ optimal rosters built based on performance.
autodistribute.thRequirementsTitle: TH Requirements for CoC Masters PL

features.title: Advanced Features
features.lockDesc: If you want to keep certain players in a specific clan, click the lock icon. Auto-Distribute will skip that clan.
features.outDesc: If a player is unavailable, click "Out". Auto-Distribute will skip them and remove from all clans.
features.filterDesc: Limit the player pool to last N seasons, specific clan, TH, war count or average stars.
features.sortDesc: Click column headers to sort: Name, Years, Wars, Attacks, Stars, Reliability, etc.
features.exportDesc: Two formats: CSV (Excel/Sheets) or Poster/PNG - beautifully formatted rosters for leaders.

tips.decideLock: Decide whether to lock a clan
tips.topReliability: Players at the top have the best Reliability
tips.lookConsistency: Look at consistency, not just stars!

faq.q1: Why is my Reliability dropping even though I play all wars?
faq.a1: Reliability depends on three factors. If your Performance (stars) drops, overall Reliability also drops, even with 100% Attendance.
faq.q2: Can I manually change assignments after Auto-Distribute?
faq.a2: Yes! Auto-Distribute is a suggestion. You can click any player and move them, remove them, or mark as "Out".
faq.q3: What happens to my changes if I click Auto-Distribute again?
faq.a3: Auto-Distribute OVERWRITES all distributions except clans that are locked. If you want to preserve changes - lock the clan.
faq.q4: Can I add a custom clan?
faq.a4: Yes! Click "Add Custom Clan" and enter name, tag (optional) and minimum TH requirement.
faq.a5: Data comes from recent official CWL seasons and is refreshed automatically. You can limit to last 2-3 seasons for fresher data.

footer.version: CoC Masters PL CWL Roster Builder v1.0
